message: Let's start fair.  I'll take the lion's share, but you get a decent chunk to start.
Let's be a bit more equitable. I'm willing to take a smaller share if you're willing to meet me halfway.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still looking for a larger share.  Let's meet in the middle this time.
I'm still willing to compromise, but I need a bigger share than 2000 to make it worthwhile. Let's split the difference from our last offers.
